pages.text: 38|62|Tara ara'o balabe, 'amadera ki hala ye, amara yesaba lokake manda bale ganya karatama taderake dekhate pacchi na [1].
38|63|Tabe ki amara taderake (ahetuka) thatta-bidrupera patra mane karatama; na tadera byapare amadera drsti bibhrama ghateche [1]
38|64|niscaya eta bastaba satya--- jahannamidera e parasparika bada-pratibada.
38|65|Baluna, 'ami to ekajana satarkakari matra ebam satya kono ilah ne'i allaha chara, yini eka, prabala pratapasali.
38|66|Yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, prabala parakramasali, mahaksamasila.
38|67|Baluna, 'eta eka mahasambada
38|68|ya theke tomara mukha phiriye niccha.
38|69|‘Urdhbaloka samparke amara kono jnana chila na yakhana tara badanubada karachila [1].
38|70|Amara kache to e ohi eseche ye, ami ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.
38|71|Smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balechilena, 'ami manusa srsti karachi kada theke
38|72|Atahpara yakhana ami take susama karaba ebam tate amara ruha sancara karaba, takhana tomara tara prati sajadabanata hayo.
38|73|Takhana pheresatara sakale'i sajadabanata hala
38|74|ibalisa chara, se ahankara karala ebam kaphiradera antarbhukta hala.

38|75|Tini balalena, 'he ibalisa! Ami yake amara du'hate [1] srsti karechi, tara prati sajadabanata hate tomake kise badha dila? Tumi ki aud'dhatya prakasa karale, na tumi adhikatara ucca maryadasampanna
38|76|se balala, 'ami tara ceye srestha. Apani amake aguna theke srsti karechena ebam take srsti karechena kada theke.’
38|77|Tini balalena, 'tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, kenana niscaya tumi bitarita.
38|78|‘Ara niscaya tomara upara amara la'nata thakabe, karmaphala dina paryanta.’
38|79|Se balala, 'he amara raba! Ata'eba apani amake sedina paryanta abakasa dina, ye dina taderake punarut'thita kara habe.
38|80|Tini balalena, 'tahale tumi abakasapraaptadera antarbhukta hale
38|81|‘nirdharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
38|82|Se balala, 'apanara ksamata-sam'manera sapatha! Abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike pathabhrasta karaba
38|83|‘tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanistha bandara byatita.
